General.Description: XP or experience-points was born such a cryptocurrency to rewards incentive and digital currency, which required a single blockchain combination. Moreover, this currency is designed to reward gamers, students, or anyone who made the positively contribution to society and community
General.Features: This ecosystem is considered as top of the most secured blockchain and customer's privacy. For the purpose to distributing globally, the XP's blockchain will not have same problem such as a bank but it is permanent and easy to connect. Last but not least, the wallet is open source, which means that it is available for anyone.
General.Technology: XP has such achievement like today because of its Proof-of-Stake validation. Moreover, the process of Proof-of-Stake algorithm which is known as “staking” is resource-intensive methods like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Then, based on the transaction, if the user stakes a transaction, she can receive a reward. In case she leaves her wallet on the network to approve transactions 24/7, the payments will be significant based on her supply on the service of verifying transactions.
